front.title: Model Context Protocol over Media over QUIC Transport

abstract.t: This document defines how to use Media over QUIC Transport (MOQT) as the underlying transport protocol for the Model Context Protocol (MCP). MCP is a protocol that enables seamless integration between language model applications and external data sources and tools. MOQT provides efficient, low-latency, publish-subscribe media delivery over QUIC and WebTransport. This specification describes the mapping of MCP messages onto MOQT objects and defines the procedures for establishing and maintaining MCP sessions over MOQT.
